attributes.action: To Add both Muslim Holidays (Eidul Adha and Fitr) to National holidays in the UK
attributes.background:
Islam is the 2nd largest religion in the UK. In 2011, 2.71 Million muslims lived in England & wales. However, as british muslims we would appreciate our values and beliefs to be respected.
All we are asking for is two days to celebrate our holy festivals and for it to be seen as a National Holiday
